name: logevent_configurationsAvailable

fields.name: salIndex
fields.description: SAL index (only present for indexed SAL components)

fields.name: private_efdStamp
fields.description: UTC time for EFD timestamp. An integer (the number of leap seconds) different from private_sndStamp.

fields.name: private_kafkaStamp
fields.description: TAI time at which the Kafka message was created.

fields.name: private_identity
fields.description: Identity of publisher: SAL component name for a CSC or user@host for a user

fields.name: overrides
fields.description: Available overrides as a comma-separated list. Each entry is a possible value of the `configurationOverride` field of the `start` command. Ignore whitespace after commas.

fields.name: version
fields.description: Version of the configuration source. For a clone of a git repo it will be a git hash.

fields.name: url
fields.description: URL of the configuration source. For a clone of a git repo this will be a file URL. For a database it will be a standard database URL.

fields.name: schemaVersion
fields.description: Version of config schema used by this CSC. For a configuration git repo, this is the name of a folder in the config package, and is typically something like "v1".

description: Available configuration overrides for this CSC.
